import Mathlib

open Topology Filter

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2019_a3_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- 2019^(-(1:ℝ)/2019)
/--
Given real numbers $b_0, b_1, \dots, b_{2019}$ with $b_{2019} \neq 0$, let $z_1,z_2,\dots,z_{2019}$ be
the roots in the complex plane of the polynomial
\[
P(z) = \sum_{k=0}^{2019} b_k z^k.
\]
Let $\mu = (|z_1| + \cdots + |z_{2019}|)/2019$ be the average of the distances from $z_1,z_2,\dots,z_{2019}$ to the origin. Determine the largest constant $M$ such that $\mu \geq M$ for all choices of $b_0,b_1,\dots, b_{2019}$ that satisfy
\[
1 \leq b_0 < b_1 < b_2 < \cdots < b_{2019} \leq 2019.
\]
-/
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₀ : putnam_2019_a3_solution = (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) := by
      rfl
    rw [h₀]
    constructor
    · intro b hb
      have h₁ := hb
      simp_all [hv, hμ]
      <;> norm_num
      <;>
      (try
        simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two]
        <;>
        norm_num
        <;>
        nlinarith)
      <;>
      positivity
    · intro M hM
      have h₁ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019)
      have h₂ := hM (Polynomial.C 1)
      have h₃ := hM (Polynomial.C 2019)
      have h₄ := hM (Polynomial.C (1 : ℂ))
      have h₅ := hM (Polynomial.C (2019 : ℂ))
      norm_num [hv, hμ, Polynomial.degree_X_pow, Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅
      <;>
      norm_num at * <;>
      nlinarith [Real.rpow_pos_of_pos (by norm_num : (0 : ℝ) < 2019) 1]
  
  exact step₁
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₁ : ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
      intro b hb
      rw [hμ]
      have h₂ := hb
      simp only [hv] at hb
      have h₃ := hb.1
      have h₄ := hb.2.1
      have h₅ := hb.2.2.1
      have h₆ := hb.2.2.2.1
      have h₇ := hb.2.2.2.2
      norm_num [putnam_2019_a3_solution] at *
      <;>
      simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two, mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
      <;>
      norm_cast
      <;>
      positivity
    have h₂ : ∀ M ∈ {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M}, M ≤ putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
      intro M hM
      have h₃ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019)
      have h₄ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019)
      have h₅ := h₃
      have h₆ := h₄
      simp only [hv] at h₃ h₄
      norm_num [putnam_2019_a3_solution, hμ, Polynomial.roots_X_pow] at *
      <;>
      aesop
    exact ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
  
  exact step₁
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
  have step1 : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₁ : putnam_2019_a3_solution = (1 : ℝ) := by
      norm_num [putnam_2019_a3_solution]
      <;> rfl
    rw [h₁]
    constructor
    · intro b hb
      have h₂ := hb
      simp only [hv] at h₂
      have h₃ := h₂.1
      have h₄ := h₂.2.1
      have h₅ := h₂.2.2.1
      have h₆ := h₂.2.2.2.1
      have h₇ := h₂.2.2.2.2
      simp_all [hμ]
      <;>
      norm_cast
      <;>
      simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two]
      <;>
      positivity
    · intro M hM
      have h₃ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019 - 1)
      have h₄ := h₃
      simp only [hv] at h₃ h₄
      norm_num [hμ, Polynomial.degree_X_pow] at h₃ h₄ ⊢
      <;>
      norm_cast at h₃ h₄ ⊢ <;>
      simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two]
      <;>
      nlinarith
  
  exact step1
```

open Topology Filter

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2019_a3_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- 2019^(-(1:ℝ)/2019)
/--
Given real numbers $b_0, b_1, \dots, b_{2019}$ with $b_{2019} \neq 0$, let $z_1,z_2,\dots,z_{2019}$ be
the roots in the complex plane of the polynomial
\[
P(z) = \sum_{k=0}^{2019} b_k z^k.
\]
Let $\mu = (|z_1| + \cdots + |z_{2019}|)/2019$ be the average of the distances from $z_1,z_2,\dots,z_{2019}$ to the origin. Determine the largest constant $M$ such that $\mu \geq M$ for all choices of $b_0,b_1,\dots, b_{2019}$ that satisfy

1 \leq b_0 < b_1 < b_2 < \cdots < b_{2019} \leq 2019.
\]
-/

    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :

```lean4
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₁ : putnam_2019_a3_solution = (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) := by
      rfl
    rw [h₁]
    constructor
    · -- Show that (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) is in the set
      intro b hb
      rw [hμ]
      have h₂ := hb
      rw [hv] at h₂
      have h₃ := h₂.2.2.2.2
      have h₄ := h₂.2.2.2.1
      have h₅ := h₂.2.2.1
      have h₆ := h₂.2.1
      have h₇ := h₂.1
      have h₈ := h₃ 0
      have h₉ := h₃ 1
      have h₁₀ := h₃ (Fin.last 2019)
      norm_num at *
      <;>
      simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two] <;>
      norm_cast at * <;>
      nlinarith [sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 0).re - 1), sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 2019).re - 2019)]
    · -- Show that (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) is the greatest element in the set
      intro M hM
      have h₂ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019 - 1)
      have h₃ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019)
      have h₄ := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019 + 1)
      norm_num [hv, hμ, Polynomial.degree_X_pow, Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two] at *
      <;>
      simp_all [Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two] <;>
      norm_num at * <;>
      nlinarith [sq_nonneg ((2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) - 1), Real.rpow_pos_of_pos (by positivity : (0 : ℝ) < 2019) (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019)]
  exact step₁
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_2019_a3
  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
  have step1 : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₁ : putnam_2019_a3_solution = (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) := by
      rfl
    rw [h₁]
    constructor
    · intro b hb
      have h2 := hb
      simp_all [hv, hμ]
      <;> norm_num

        <;>

      <;>

        positivity)

          sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 0).im), sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 2019).im),
          sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 0).re), sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 2019).re),
          sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 0).im), sq_nonneg ((b.coeff 2019).im)] )

        positivity)
      <;>
      (try
        nlinarith)
    · intro M hM
      have h3 := hM (Polynomial.X ^ 2019)
      have h4 := hM (Polynomial.C (1 : ℂ))
      have h5 := hM (Polynomial.C (2019 : ℂ))
      norm_num [hv, hμ, Complex.abs, Complex.normSq, pow_two, mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm] at h3 h4 h5
      <;>

      <;>
      (try

  exact step1
```

  (v : Polynomial ℂ → Prop)
  (hv : v = fun b => b.degree = 2019 ∧ 1 ≤ (b.coeff 0).re ∧ (b.coeff 2019).re ≤ 2019 ∧
    (∀ i : Fin 2020, (b.coeff i).im = 0) ∧ (∀ i : Fin 2019, (b.coeff i).re < (b.coeff (i + 1)).re))
  (μ : Polynomial ℂ → ℝ)
  (hμ : μ = fun b => (Multiset.map (fun ω : ℂ => ‖ω‖) (Polynomial.roots b)).sum/2019) :
  IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
```lean4
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {M : ℝ | ∀ b, v b → μ b ≥ M} putnam_2019_a3_solution := by
    have h₁ : putnam_2019_a3_solution = (2019 : ℝ) ^ (-(1 : ℝ) / 2019) := by
```
